entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
